## About the Project

### Covid-19 and GDP

My project, *Covid-19 and GDP*, explores the correlation between GDP and Covid-19 confirmed cases.

### Goals

*   Discover the relationship between Covid-19 confirmed cases and GDP.

*   Learn about creating websites with Distill.

    +   Complete the Distill tutorial.
